long_description: The Mountainsmith Lariat 65 Pack is a true workhorse for week-long backpacking trips and adventure travel. It comes with a detachable daypack for shorter excursions and summit pushes. Innovative ICS Cup(TM) (Illiac Crest Shelf) hipbelt transfers weight and locks the pack load onto the hips; Anvil Airway(TM) back panel helps keep you cool. Delta Wing Compression system pulls the load into the lumbar region and focuses it onto the Lumbar Control Point(TM) pad on the lower back panel. U-shaped zippered access to main compartment enables fast packing and easy organization; internal hydration sleeve with single back-panel exit port (reservoir sold separately). Detachable, 6.5-liter summit pack features a mesh back-panel hydration sleeve (reservoir sold separately). The Mountainsmith Lariat 65 Pack features bottom panel compression straps and side panel mesh pockets that fit most water bottles.
short_description: The Mountainsmith Lariat 65 Pack is a true workhorse for week-long backpacking trips and adventure travel. It comes with a detachable daypack for shorter excursions and summit pushes.
